summary: Website/app builder with content upload functionality. User experienced data loss when draft app expired and was redeployed.
architectural_notes: Draft apps expire after a period of inactivity, requiring redeployment
Redeployment uses existing code but does not restore user data/content
known_issues: User content/data is lost when draft app expires and gets redeployed

new_feature_requests.summary: Restore all user-added content (articles, X posts, spotlights, wisdom quotes, resources, and cybercrime articles) that was present before the draft app expired
